title: Learning Experience Design (LXD) Workshop through a Socio-Technical Educational Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners are K-12 science education facilitators requiring enhanced competencies in designing science education using digital devices. Flexible learning experiences are needed, considering cultural sensitivity and applicability to real-world learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more science education design frameworks that reflect sociocultural contexts.
Learners can develop learning experience design scenarios that integrate digital tools with educational theories.
Learners can propose two or more specific strategies considering cultural sensitivity when designing science education content tailored to learner characteristics.

resources: Digital Content Authoring Tool for Science Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
